desc: Shop Artaxis is the storefront for Artaxis Organization Inc., a 501(c)3 non-profit art organization that provides a peer-reviewed source of contemporary artwork in ceramics and sculpture. Artaxis strives to promote and enrich the field, while functioning as a direct and unobtrusive conduit between viewer and artist.

layout.text: Artaxis is a 501(c)3 non-profit art organization and proceeds from this page support artists and our programming and outreach efforts.
